DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy high-dose post-transplantation cyclophosphomide graft-versus-host disease ( GVHD ) prophylaxis allogeneic stem cell transplantation patient different risk GVHD . The risk-adapted strategy involve use single-agent cyclophosphomide recipient match bone marrow graft , combine cyclophosphomide tacrolimus mycophenolate mofetil recipient match peripheral blood stem cell mismatch bone marrow .
DOC.brief_title: Post-transplantation Cyclophosphamide GVHD Prophylaxis After HSCT
DOC.criteria: Patients must indication allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation Signed informed consent Patients donor available . The donor recipient must identical least one allele follow genetic locus : HLAA , HLAB , HLACw , HLADRB1 , HLADQB1 . A minimum match 5/10 require related donor . A minimum match 8/10 require unrelated donor .
